entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grand Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Beach 01:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -23.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -27.1°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
